message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a game-changer in its industry and has a lot of potential for growth. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

I'm interested in the product, but $14000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $14000 might be a bit steep, but I have to consider the product's value and the potential returns it can bring to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

I understand that $12000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to compromise further. Considering your offer of $10000, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Considering your offer of $10500, I'll offer the product to you for $10800. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, so I'm willing to make one more compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $10500. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and I'll meet you at $10500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.
